alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 04 at 2:35AM PST until February 04 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR LAKE TAHOE... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Lake Tahoe. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will continue overnight into Sunday and a winter storm warning goes into effect at 7 PM this evening.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
